summary: RHYTHM IS IT! records the first big educational project of the Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra under Sir Simon Rattle. The orchestra ventured out of the ivory tower of high culture into ... See full summary »
cast: Simon Rattle|Royston Maldoom|Susannah Broughton|Marie Theinert|Martin Eisentraut|Olayinka Shitu|Volker Eisenach|Berliner Philharmoniker|Miriam Pech
director: Directors: Thomas Grube, Enrique Sánchez Lansch
title: Rhythm Is It!
